Text.Page:
Thulsa turned us into monsters, after sending the {@LinkCreature:33#54#cursed vampir gentleman} and {@LinkCreature:33#55#infernal jesters} to attack us.

Their wicked laughter will ring in my ears to the end of my days. You have to stop them before they attack the new strike force.

Never again will they torture another soldier.

Here is something else for you. I hope it will help you on your journey.
